electronicsGadgets.name: Smartphone X
electronicsGadgets.description: A high-performance smartphone with a 6.7-inch AMOLED display (120Hz), Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor, 12GB RAM, 256GB storage, triple rear camera (108MP + 12MP + 8MP), 5000mAh battery with 65W fast charging, 5G connectivity, WiFi 6E, and Bluetooth 5.3.

electronicsGadgets.name: Laptop Pro
electronicsGadgets.description: A powerful laptop designed for professionals with a 16-inch Retina display (120Hz), Intel Core i9 13th Gen processor, 32GB RAM, 1TB SSD storage, NVIDIA RTX 4070 GPU, all-day battery life with fast charging, WiFi 6E, Thunderbolt 4, and USB-C support.

electronicsGadgets.name: Wireless Earbuds
electronicsGadgets.description: True wireless earbuds featuring 10mm dynamic drivers for deep bass, Bluetooth 5.3 with low-latency mode, active noise cancellation (ANC), up to 30 hours battery life with case, and IPX5 water resistance.

electronicsGadgets.name: Smart Watch
electronicsGadgets.description: A premium smartwatch with a 1.78-inch AMOLED always-on display, heart rate, SpO2, and ECG monitoring, built-in GPS, NFC, voice assistant support, water resistance up to 50 meters, and up to 10-day battery life.

electronicsGadgets.name: Tablet Plus
electronicsGadgets.description: A high-performance tablet featuring a 12.4-inch OLED display (120Hz), Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor, 8GB RAM, 256GB storage, support for stylus and keyboard attachment, and a 10,000mAh battery with 45W fast charging.

electronicsGadgets.name: Gaming Console Z
electronicsGadgets.description: A next-gen gaming console with an AMD Ryzen 9 processor, 16GB GDDR6 RAM, 1TB SSD storage, support for 4K gaming at 120fps, HDR and Ray Tracing, WiFi 6, and Bluetooth 5.3.

electronicsGadgets.name: Bluetooth Speaker
electronicsGadgets.description: A powerful portable Bluetooth speaker with dual 10W drivers for deep bass, Bluetooth 5.0 connectivity, IP67 waterproof and dustproof rating, up to 20 hours of playtime, and USB-C fast charging.

electronicsGadgets.name: 4K Smart TV
electronicsGadgets.description: A 55-inch 4K UHD OLED Smart TV featuring Dolby Vision, 120Hz refresh rate, HDR10+ support, built-in voice assistant and app store, WiFi 6, HDMI 2.1, USB ports, and Dolby Atmos surround sound.

electronicsGadgets.name: VR Headset
electronicsGadgets.description: A high-end virtual reality headset with 4K resolution per eye, 120-degree field of view, built-in spatial audio, advanced motion tracking, and compatibility with PC and gaming consoles.

electronicsGadgets.name: Noise Cancelling Headphones
electronicsGadgets.description:
• Active noise cancellation (ANC)  
• 40mm drivers with deep bass  
• Bluetooth 5.2 with multipoint connection  
• Up to 35 hours battery life  
• Fast charging via USB-C  
• Foldable design with premium build

electronicsGadgets.name: Portable Charger
electronicsGadgets.description:
• 20,000mAh high-capacity battery  
• USB-C PD and QC 3.0 fast charging  
• Dual USB output ports  
• Compact and lightweight design  
• LED battery indicator

• Intelligent shooting modes
